tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE TreatmentCodes (  treatment_code INT PRIMARY KEY,  description STRING )
CREATE TABLE InsuranceInformation (  insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,  insurance_name STRING,  policy_number STRING,  policy_holder_name STRING,  policy_expiry_date DATE )

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  patient_dob DATE NOT NULL,
  insurance_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  policy_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
    insurance_id INT REFERENCES insurance_info(insurance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_info (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patient_info(patient_id),
    code_id INT REFERENCES treatment_codes(code_id),
    bill_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    bill_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentCodes (
    treatment_code VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE InsuranceProviders (
    insurance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    insurance_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (insurance_id) REFERENCES InsuranceProviders(insurance_id)
)

CREATE TABLE BillingRecords (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_code VARCHAR(10),
    billed_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    billing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (treatment_code) REFERENCES TreatmentCodes(treatment_code)
)

CREATE TABLE ClaimsProcessing (
    claim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT,
    processing_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    processed_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (record_id) REFERENCES BillingRecords(record_id)
)
